      • updateSetMembers

        SetMembersInfo updateSetMembers(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                              long setId,
                              java.lang.String[] ieIds)
                                throws UserAuthorizeException,
                                       com.exlibris.core.sdk.exceptions.SetNotValidException
        API for updating set Members. First clears existing members in the given itemized set and will than update an existing itemized set with the provided list of IE PIDs.
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged-in user, Mandatory
        setId - of the existing itemize set to be updated
        ieIds - of Pids array that will updated to be members of the set
        Returns:
        SetMembersInfo
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.core.sdk.exceptions.SetNotValidException
        UserAuthorizeException

      • runProcessOnPids

        java.lang.Long runProcessOnPids(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                              long processId,
                              java.lang.String[] pidList)
                                throws UserAuthorizeException,
                                       com.exlibris.core.sdk.exceptions.ProcessException
        API for running process on a given array of pids. The set which is associated with the given process will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged-in user, Mandatory
        processId - of process to run
        pidList - array of pids
        Returns:
        long - processExecutionId to be monitored by getProcessExecutionStatus
        Throws:
        UserAuthorizeException
        com.exlibris.core.sdk.exceptions.ProcessException
